main event: Two UFO sightings were reported on June 14 and June 15, 1955, in Minneapolis, Minnesota, and Topeka, Kansas.
interesting points: The first sighting involved a round, brilliant green object changing to red, seen for about 3 seconds,The second sighting noted a similar object observed for about 1 minute,The object appeared to have small pieces fall from it during the flight,The sighting was evaluated and deemed possible meteor sightings by headquarters,No photographs were included with the reports.
witness description: military pilot and weather jet pilot
